index.intro-heading: Empowering Educators for a Digital World
index.lead-text:
MyWebClass is a website providing accessible resources to educators teaching modern technology, to their
 students. Join today and discover the ways our website can transform your teaching, and help you
 confidently prepare students for successful futures in the digital age.

story-page.section-welcome-p1:
Welcome to MyWebClass, a website dedicated to providing resources to educators who want to teach
 modern technology, such as cutting-ege software engineering skills, to their students. With the world
 becoming increasingly digital, it is important for students to have a strong foundation in these
 skills to prepare them for future careers. However, it can be daunting for educators who are not most
 up-to-date or familiar with the latest technologies available to teach these subjects effectively.
story-page.section-welcome-p2:
That's where we come in. Our website offers a range of resources, including lesson plans, activities,
 assessments, and teaching guides, all designed to make teaching technology and software engineering
 accessible and engaging for both educators and students. Whether you are a seasoned technology
 educator or new to teaching these subjects, we have something for everyone.
story-page.section-mission-p1:
At MyWebClass, our mission is to empower educators with the knowledge and resources they need to teach
 modern technology skills, including cutting-edge software engineering, to their students. As the world
 becomes more digital, we believe it is critical for students to have a strong foundation in these
 skills to succeed in future careers. We recognize the challenges that educators may face in keeping up
 with the latest technologies, and we are committed to providing them with the support they need to
 teach these subjects effectively.
story-page.section-values-p1-people-text:
We value people above all else. We believe that every individual has the
 potential to learn and succeed, and we are committed to providing inclusive and accessible resources
 that empower educators and students of all backgrounds. We strive to create a welcoming and
 supportive community that encourages collaboration and fosters personal and professional growth. We
 recognize that our success depends on the success of our users, and we are dedicated to helping them
 achieve their goals. Above all, we are driven by a passion for education and a belief in the
 transformative power of technology to create a brighter future for all.
story-page.section-values-p2-learning-text:
We value learning as the foundation of personal and professional growth.
 We believe that modern technology skills are essential for success in today's world, and we are
 committed to providing high-quality educational resources that help educators and students achieve
 their goals. We believe that learning should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their
 background or experience, and we are dedicated to creating an inclusive and supportive learning
 environment that encourages exploration, experimentation, and innovation. We believe in the power of
 collaboration and community to facilitate learning, and we are committed to fostering connections
 between educators, students, and industry professionals to ensure that our content remains relevant
 and up-to-date. Above all, we believe that learning is a lifelong journey, and we are committed to
 supporting our users in their pursuit of knowledge and skill development.
story-page.section-values-p3-efficiency-text:
We value efficiency in all aspects of our work. We believe that
 educators' time and resources are valuable, and we are committed to providing them with efficient
 and effective solutions for teaching modern technology skills. We strive to streamline our processes
 and optimize our resources to deliver high-quality, up-to-date materials and support to our
 educators and students. We believe that by promoting efficiency, we can help educators achieve their
 goals and prepare students for successful futures in the digital age
story-page.section-values-p4-dependability-text:
At MyWebClass, we value dependability as a fundamental aspect of our
 work. We recognize the critical importance of educators having access to reliable and trustworthy
 resources to effectively teach modern technology skills to their students. As such, we are committed
 to being a dependable partner for our educators, delivering consistent and high-quality educational
 materials and support. We strive to be responsive to the needs of our educators and students and to
 always follow through on our commitments. We believe that by being dependable, we can earn the trust
 of our partners and help them achieve their goals in preparing students for successful careers in
 the rapidly evolving world of technology.
story-page.section-values-mission-supports: Each of these core values supports our mission in distinct ways:
story-page.section-values-value-of-people-text:
above all else drives us to provide inclusive and accessible
 resources, ensuring that educators and students of all backgrounds have the opportunity to learn and
 succeed in modern technology skills.
story-page.section-values-value-of-learning-text:
as the foundation of personal and professional growth
 underpins our commitment to providing high-quality educational resources and fostering an inclusive
 and supportive learning environment, enabling educators and students to effectively teach and learn
 modern technology skills.
story-page.section-values-value-of-efficiency-depen:
enable us to deliver streamlined and
 reliable educational materials and support, empowering educators to teach modern technology skills
 effectively and equipping students with a strong foundation to succeed in future careers in the
 ever-evolving world of technology.
story-page.section-origin-p1:
Mywebclass.org was founded in 2023 by Keith Williams, a University Lecturer at New Jersey Institute of
 Technology with over 30 years of experience as a software engineer, entrepreneur, and 17 years of
 experience as a university lecturer and in K-12 education. Keith founded mywebclass.org to help bridge
 the gap between educators and professionals in the software industry by creating a community of people
 committed to helping students of all ages and backgrounds succeed.
story-page.section-origin-p2:
MyWebClass is carried forward in its latest form by Arly Volmar, Dina Lahham, and Nathan Hernandez.
 Each brings their unique talents and experiences in order to deliver the latest great feature
 enhancements and improvements necessary to continue to improve the MyWebClass customer experience!
story-page.section-origin-p3-lead:
Thank you for your interest in mywebclass.org. Together, we can create a community of people committed
 to helping students of all ages and backgrounds succeed in the modern software industry.
story-page.section-origin-p3-em-text: Let's keep working towards this goal and make a positive impact in the lives of countless individuals!

privacy-page.section-privacy-intro-p1:
At MyWebClass, we are committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy explains
 how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By using our website, you consent to the
 terms of this Privacy Policy.
privacy-page.section-privacy-information-we-collect-p: When you visit our website, we may collect the following types of personal information:
privacy-page.section-privacy-information-we-collect-i:
Information you provide us directly, such as your name, email address, and phone number when you
 sign up for our services or contact us.

Information we collect automatically through cookies and other tracking technologies, such as your
 IP address, browser type, and device type.

Information we receive from third-party sources, such as Google Analytics, which we use to track
 website traffic and usage.
privacy-page.section-how-we-use-your-information-p1: We may use the personal information we collect in the following ways:
privacy-page.section-how-we-use-your-information-item: To provide you with our services and respond to your inquiries.
To personalize your experience on our website.
To improve our website and services.

To send you marketing communications about our services or other products and services that we
 believe may be of interest to you.
privacy-page.section-how-we-protect-your-information-:
We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or
 disclosure. We use industry-standard security measures, such as firewalls and encryption, to protect
 your personal information.
privacy-page.section-google-analytics-p1:
We use Google Analytics to track website traffic and usage. Google Analytics collects information
 about your use of our website, including your IP address, and may place cookies on your computer. This
 information is used to improve our website and services.
privacy-page.section-changes-to-your-privacy-policy-p:
We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify you of any
 material changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy on our website. Your continued use of our
 website after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised Privacy Policy.
privacy-page.section-contact-us-p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us.
